properties.name: tool
properties.description: The Operation to consume

options.name: Check Domain Has Social Activity
options.description: Discover if a domain has social network presence Info

options.name: Check Email Domain Is Catchall
options.description: Check if domain accepts all emails, existing or not Info

options.name: Check Email Domain Is Free
options.description: Check if domain is a free service domain provider Info

options.name: Check Email Domain Is Temporary
options.description: Check if domain is temporary or not Info

options.name: Check Email Exists (Extended)
options.description:
Discover if an email is valid, hardbounce, softbounce, spamtrap, free, temporary and recipient exists.

There are catchall (like Yahoo) or temporary domains that do not return the actual existence of an email Info

options.name: Check Email Exists (Simple)
options.description: Discover if the email recipient exists, returning email status Info

options.name: Check Email Has SMTP Server
options.description: Check if email domain has an SMTP server to receive emails Info

options.name: Check Email Has Social Activity
options.description: Discover if the email has social network presence Info

options.name: Check Email Has Valid Format
options.description: Check if email has a valid format Info

options.name: Check Email Is Catchall
options.description: Check if email belongs to a catchall email server Info

options.name: Check Email Is Disposable Domain
options.description: Check if email domain belongs to a disposable email service Info

options.name: Check Email Is Free
options.description: Check if email belongs to free service provider, like gmail, hotmail, ... Info

options.name: Check Email Is Robinson (ES)
options.description: Discover if an email exists in the Robinson list (only Spain) Info

options.name: Check Email Is Role Based
options.description: Check if email belongs to a system or role based account Info

options.name: Check Email Is Spam Trap
options.description: Check if email is a spam trap Info

options.name: Check Imei Is Valid
options.description: Discover if Imei number has a valid format Info

options.name: Check LinkedIn Profile Is Contact
options.description: Check if a LinkedIn profile (url format accepted: https://linkedin.com/in/USERNAME) is a first degree contact Info

options.name: Check Mobile Exists
options.description:
Discover if mobile phone number exists in network operator, with worldwide coverage.
Get advanced mobile KPIs with 'Mobile lookup' tool. Info

options.name: Check Mobile Has Social Activity
options.description: Discover if the mobile phone has social network presence Info

options.name: Check Mobile Has Valid Format
options.description: Discover if mobile phone number has a valid format, with worldwide coverage Info

options.name: Check Mobile Has Valid Format (ES)
options.description: Discover if mobile phone number has a valid format (only Spain) Info

options.name: Check Mobile Has Valid Prefix
options.description: Discover if mobile phone number has a valid prefix, with worldwide coverage Info

options.name: Check Mobile Has Valid Prefix (ES)
options.description: Discover if spanish mobile phone number has a valid prefix Info

options.name: Check Mobile Is Alive
options.description:
Discover if a mobile number is switched on to call it later, with worldwide coverage.
Some carriers don't return if mobile is alive (like Vodafone) Info

options.name: Check Mobile Supports Sms
options.description: Discover if a mobile number can receive sms, with worldwide coverage Info

options.name: Check Phone Is Robinson (ES)
options.description: Discover if a phone (landline or mobile) exists in a Robinson list (only Spain) Info

options.name: Check Phone Or Mobile Valid
options.description: Discover if landline or mobile number has a valid prefix Info

options.name: Check Valid Phone Format (ES)
options.description: Discover if landline phone number is valid, with Spain coverage Info

options.name: Check Valid Phone Format By Country
options.description: Allow to discover if landline number has a good international format, depending on country Info

options.name: Check Valid Phone Prefix
options.description: Discover if a landline phone number prefix exists, with worldwide coverage Info

options.name: Get Cleaned Phone
options.description: Clean a phone removing non allowed characters Info

options.name: Get Country ISO Code By Mobile
options.description: Allow to get country code (two chars) of a mobile phone number with international format Info

options.name: Get Domain By Email
options.description: Get domain part from an email Info

options.name: Get Email By Firstname, Lastname And Company
options.description:
Discover an email by company's name and prospect's firstname and lastname.

If the 'verify' method is selected, the tool checks multiple email variants in real-time, and returns a result depending on the email server response Info

options.name: Get Email By Fullname And Company
options.description:
Discover an email by company's name and prospect's fullname.

If the 'verify' method is selected, the tool checks multiple email variants in real-time, and returns a result depending on the email server response Info

options.name: Get Email By Fullname And Domain
options.description:
Discover an email by company website or domain and prospect's fullname.

If the 'verify' method is selected, the tool checks multiple email variants in real-time, and returns a result depending on the email server response Info

options.name: Get Email By Name, Surname And Domain
options.description:
Discover an email by company website or domain and prospect's firstname and lastname.

If the 'verify' method is selected, the tool checks multiple email variants in real-time, and returns a result depending on email server response Info

options.name: Get Email By Social Network Profile
options.description: Discover an email by contact's LinkedIn profile URI Info

options.name: Get Email Type
options.description: Get email type Info

options.name: Get Emails By Domain
options.description: Get emails list found on internet by domain or URI (similar to hunter.io) Info

options.name: Get Emails By Email
options.description: Get emails list found on internet by non-free email (similar to hunter.io) Info

options.name: Get First Web References Of An Email
options.description: Get three first web references of an email published on Internet Info

options.name: Get Fixed Domain Email
options.description: Fix the email domain of those misspelled emails (supports all domains) Info

options.name: Get Fixed Phone
options.description: Fix the international prefix of a phone based on the ISO code of a country Info

options.name: Get Formatted Mobile
options.description: Format international mobile number by country ISO code (2 letters). Info

options.name: Get GDPR Emails By Domain
options.description: Get GDPR compliant emails list by domain for your Email Marketing campaigns in Europe. Info

options.name: Get HLR Mobile Lookup
options.description: Discover if mobile exist via real time [HLR](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Home_location_register) query Info

options.name: Get Landline/Mobile Portability Lookup (ES)
options.description: Get portability data about a landline or mobile number, only for Spain Info

options.name: Get LinkedIn Company Employees
options.description: Extract results from a LinkedIn search (url format accepted: https://linkedin.com/search/results/people/) Info

options.name: Get LinkedIn Group Members
options.description: Get members in a LinkedIn group Info

options.name: Get LinkedIn Last Received Connections
options.description: Extract last 80 connections from your LinkedIn profile Info

options.name: Get LinkedIn Last Sent Invitations
options.description: Extract last 80 invitations sent from your LinkedIn Info

options.name: Get LinkedIn Post Comments
options.description: Get users who comment a post on LinkedIn Info

options.name: Get LinkedIn Post Likes
options.description: Get users who like a post on LinkedIn Info

options.name: Get LinkedIn Profile
options.description: Extract a LinkedIn profile (url format accepted: https://linkedin.com/in/USERNAME) Info

options.name: Get LinkedIn Profiles
options.description: Extract results from a LinkedIn search (url format accepted: https://linkedin.com/search/results/people/) Info

options.name: Get LinkedIn Profiles By Content
options.description: Extract fastly last profiles that have published content on LinkedIn by specific keywords Info

options.name: Get Mobile Lookup
options.description: Discover if mobile exist via real time [HLR](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Home_location_register) query, as well as portability and roaming data Info

options.name: Get Mobile Portability Lookup
options.description: Get existence, portability and roaming of a mobile phone, via [MNP](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mobile_number_portability) query Info

options.name: Get Mobile/Landline Lookup (Spain)
options.description: Discover if mobile or landline prefix exists on Spain. Info

options.name: Get Normalized Email
options.description: Normalize email address, removing non allowed characters Info

options.name: Get Normalized Mobile
options.description: Allow to normalize a mobile phone, removing non allowed characters Info

options.name: Get Parsed And Validated Phone
options.description: Parse phone numbers in multiple fields and verify the format and prefix validity Info

options.name: Get Personal Email By Social Network Profile
options.description: Discover all the personal emails by social profile Info

options.name: Get Phone Prefix By Country ISO Code
options.description: Allow to get country prefix number by country code (2 characters) Info

options.name: Get Public Profile By Sales Profile
options.description: Convert a LinkedIn Sales profile (/sales/people/) to a LinkedIn public profile (/in/) Info

options.name: Get Search LinkedIn Contacts Url
options.description: Generate a LinkedIn search contacts URL considering the keywords provided Info

options.name: Get Social Network Activity
options.description: This tools parses a social uri address and extracts any available indicators Info

options.name: Get Social Networks Activity By Domain
options.description: Search all social networks by domain, parses all found urls and returns social networks kpis (if data available) Info

options.name: Get Social Networks By Domain
options.description: Discover if a domain or a website has social activity and returns all social network profiles found Info

options.name: Get Social Networks By Email
options.description: Discover if an email has social activity, and get all social network profiles found Info

options.name: Get Social Networks By Mobile
options.description: Discover if an mobile phone has social activity, and get all social network profiles found Info

options.name: Get Web References Of An Email
options.description: Get web references of an email published on Internet Info

options.name: Send Connection Request To Linkedin Profile
options.description: Send a custom message invitation to a non connected Linkedin profile (supported uris: https://www.linkedin.com/in/USERID) Info

options.name: Send Custom Email
options.description: Send a custom email (HTML supported) to a recipient Info

options.name: Send Custom Sms
options.description: Send a custom sms to a recipient with worldwide coverage Info

options.name: Send Invitation Or Message To Linkedin Profile
options.description: Send a custom invitation message (parameter message1) if profile is connected or a custom message (parameter message2) otherwise (supported uris: https://www.linkedin.com/in/USERID) Info

options.name: Send LinkedIn Profile Visit
options.description: Visits a profile to show interest and get profile views in return from contact, increasing your LinkedIn network Info

options.name: Send Message To Linkedin Profile
options.description: Send a custom private message to a connected Linkedin profile (supported uris: https://www.linkedin.com/in/USERID) Info

0x, Aave Coin, Algorand, Aragon, Augur, AugurV2, AuroraCoin, Bancor, Bankex, Basic Attention Token, BeaverCoin, BioCoin, Bitcoin, Bitcoin SV, BitcoinCash, BitcoinGold, BitcoinPrivate, BitcoinZ, BlockTrade, BTU Protocol, Callisto, Cardano, Chainlink, Civic, Compound, Cred, Crypto.com Coin, CUSD, Dash, Decentraland, Decred, DigiByte, District0x, DogeCoin, Enjin Coin, EOS, Ethereum, EthereumClassic, EtherZero, Expanse, FirmaChain, FreiCoin, GameCredits, GarliCoin, Gnosis, Golem, Golem (GNT), HedgeTrade, Hush, HyperSpace, iExec RLC, Komodo, LBRY Credits, Lisk, LiteCoin, loki, Loom Network, Maker, Matchpool, Matic, MegaCoin, Melon, Metal, MonaCoin, Monero, Multi-collateral DAI, NameCoin, Nano, Nem, Neo, NeoGas, Numeraire, Ocean Protocol, Odyssey, OmiseGO, Paxos, PeerCoin, PIVX, Polkadot, Polymath, PrimeCoin, ProtoShares, Qtum, Quant, Quantum Resistant Ledger, RaiBlocks, Ripio Credit Network, Ripple, Salt, Serve, Siacoin, SnowGem, SolarCoin, SOLVE, Spendcoin, Status, Stellar, Storj, Storm, StormX, Swarm City, Synthetix Network, Tap, TEMCO, TenX, Tether, Tezos, Tron, TrueUSD, Uniswap Coin, USD Coin, VeChain, VertCoin, Viberate, VoteCoin, Waves, Wings, ZCash, ZClassic, ZenCash Info
